name: Little Monster Baby Blanket Cape , Multifunctional !
description:
How cute is that ? This Sweet Blanket remind me of the film " where the wild things are ".
keep the little ones warm with the cutest monster Blanket !

{ Product Size } : 90*75CM
{ Product Material } : Cotton & Micro polar fleece
{ For Age } : 0-3 yrs
{ Product weight } :0.25kg

name: Reversible Little Red Riding Hood Cape - [ Pink+Sweet Cherry]
description:
Perfect for in and out during Autumn / Winter.
Easy to take it off and put it on, 
Light weight but super warm !

【 Product Size 】 : One Size , Length 39* Sleeve 34CM
【 Product Material 】: Cotton & Micro polar fleece 
【 For Age 】 : 6months-3 yrs 
【 Product Weight 】: 0.5kg
【 Available Colours】: 
  a. Midnight Blue+Trees 
  b. White+ English Rose 
  c. Baby Blue + Trees 
  d. Pink+Cherry
